info.name: v1
info.description:
The V1 folder represents the first version of the API, containing endpoints and functionalities specific to this version.

This folder serves as the root for version 1 of the API, encapsulating all endpoints, views, and actions related to version 1 functionality. Developers can interact with endpoints within this version to access job and employee management features as defined in the initial release of the API.

item.name: User

request.description: This endpoint allows users to register for a new account in the system.
This endpoint handles user authentication and generates an access token for the user's session.
This endpoint allows users to terminate their current session and log out from the system.

item.description: This folder contains endpoints related to user management, including user registration, authentication (login), and logout functionalities.

item.name: Employee
Views

request.description: Renders a view displaying all employee records without pagination.

response.name: Show view

item.description: This subfolder contains endpoints that render views for various employee-related actions, such as displaying employee lists, creating, showing, updating, and deleting employee records.

item.name: Actions

request.description: Creates a new employee record and stores it in the database.
Updates the details of a specific employee record in the database.
Deletes a specific employee record from the database.
Retrieves the chain of managers for a specific employee up to the founder.

response.name: Find Managers

request.description: Retrieves the chain of managers for a specific employee up to the founder, including salary information.

response.name: Find Managers With Salaries

request.description: Searches for employees by their name or salary.

response.name: Search

request.description: Exports all employee records to a CSV file and downloaded.

response.name: Export as CSV

request.description: Imports employee records from a CSV file into the database.

item.description: This folder contains endpoints related to performing actions on employee records, including creating, updating, deleting, searching, exporting, and importing employee data.
This folder contains endpoints related to employee management, including displaying, creating, updating, and deleting employee records.

item.name: Job
Views

request.description: Renders a view displaying all job records without pagination.
Renders a paginated view displaying job records.

response.name: List View

request.description: Renders a form for creating a new job record.
Renders a view displaying detailed information about a specific job record.
Renders a form for updating an existing job record.
Renders a confirmation form for deleting an existing job record.

item.description: This subfolder contains endpoints that render views for various job-related actions, such as displaying job lists, creating, showing, updating, and deleting job records.

item.name: Actions

request.description: Creates a new job record and stores it in the database.
Updates the details of a specific job record in the database.
Deletes a specific job record from the database.

item.description: This subfolder contains endpoints for performing actions on job records, including creating, updating, and deleting job records.
This folder contains endpoints related to job management, including displaying, creating, updating, and deleting job records.
